verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Awake, Oh Israel,
put off thy slumber
And the Truth shall set you free
For out of Zion comes a deliverer
in the year of Jubilee.
Out of the furnace of much affliction
I have chosen to restore.
And for iron I'll give you silver
And for brass I'll give you gold.
Thou art my chosen,
for I have sought thee.
Thou art graven on my hand
And I will gather all those who gather
And will come back to the land.
